After the sudden disappearance of gravity, the city of New Eden is thrown into chaos. Amidst the chaos, a young man named Alex finds himself levitating above his apartment complex, watching as buildings and vehicles float away. With the help of a group of rebels, Alex sets out to uncover the truth behind the mysterious force field that has enveloped the city, leading to a showdown between the forces of good and evil.

In a world where gravity has ceased to exist, a group of astronauts on a mission to Mars find themselves floating in the vast expanse of space. As they try to navigate the weightless environment, they stumble upon a strange artifact that emits a powerful force field. With the help of a team of scientists, the astronauts must unravel the mystery of the artifact and its connection to the disappearance of gravity before it's too late.

In a world where gravity has disappeared, a group of children in a school find themselves floating above their desks and chairs. As they try to make sense of the bizarre phenomenon, they discover that they are the only ones who possess the power of gravity. With the help of a group of adults, the children must learn to harness their powers and save the world from the forces of chaos that threaten to destroy it.

After the sudden disappearance of gravity, a group of superheroes find themselves floating above their city. As they try to make sense of the bizarre phenomenon, they discover that they are the only ones who possess the power of gravity. With the help of a team of scientists, the superheroes must learn to harness their powers and save the world from the forces of chaos that threaten to destroy it.

In a world where gravity has ceased to exist, a group of time travelers find themselves floating in the vast expanse of time. As they try to navigate the weightless environment, they stumble upon a strange artifact that emits a powerful force field. With the help of a team of scientists, the time travelers must unravel the mystery of the artifact and its connection to the disappearance of gravity before it's too late.
